ac: 20, touch 10, flat-footed 17 (+5 armor, +3 Dex, +5 natural, -2 rage, -1 size)
special_attacks: rage (19 rounds/day), rage powers (increased damage reduction, superstition +3), rend (2 claws, 1d6+17)
other_gear: +1 chain shirt, gauntlets of rending *, 50 gp
feats: Great Rend*, Intimidating Prowess, Mighty Bite*, Raging Regeneration*, Weapon Focus (claw)
senses: darkvision 60 ft., low-light vision, scent; Perception +12

sections.body:
Base Statistics When he's not raging, the barbarian's statistics are

AC 22, touch 12, flat-footed 19

hp 148

Fort +18

Will +3; bite +14 (1d8+7), 2 claws +15 (1d6+9); rend (2 claws, 1d6+14)

Str 25

Con 28

CMB +16

CMD 29

Skills Intimidate +16.

name: Troll Berserker
